summary: Successful actress returns to her family home in rural Austria to visit her ailing father and her sister who spent her whole life taking care of him and her family. The reunion is marked by jealousy, introspection and a secret.
cast: Nora von Waldstätten|Peter Simonischek|Ursula Strauss|Sebastian Koch|Johannes Zeiler|Andreas Ressl|Samuel Finzi|Sebastian Hülk|Randolf Destaller|Judith Engel|Jörn Hentschel|Julia Koch|Claudia Martini|Sascha Merényi|Wolfgang Zarnack|Brigitte Zeh
title: Oktober November
